TEXT.BODY: Qtr ended Feb 28 Shr 24 cts vs 24 cts Net 10.0 mln vs 10.1 mln Revs 202.8 mln vs 184.6 mln Nine mths Shr 66 cts vs 67 cts Net 27.3 mln vs 27.6 mln Revs 588.2 mln vs 539.2 mln Note: 1986 shr data adjusted for 3-for-2 stock split paid October 1986. Reuter
